info.ice_and_fire_spellbooks.toornahkrii: Rare treasure item found in Fire Dragon Caves.
info.ice_and_fire_spellbooks.fodaan: Rare treasure item found in Ice Dragon Caves.
info.ice_and_fire_spellbooks.vulonqo: Rare treasure item found in Lightning Dragon Caves.
info.ice_and_fire_spellbooks.vulnilviir: Rare treasure item found in End Cities.
info.ice_and_fire_spellbooks.vulsilah: Rare treasure item found in Ancient Cities.
info.atmospheric.orange: Grows on Orange and Laurel trees. Can be placed while sneaking, place around a Laurel sapling to grow more oranges.
info.atmospheric.blood_orange: Grown on Laurel trees surrounded by oranges in the Nether.
info.caverns_and_chasms.spinel_ore: Common ore distributed lower in the world.
info.caverns_and_chasms.deepslate_spinel: Common ore distributed lower in the world.
info.caverns_and_chasms.tuning_fork: Can copy and paste noteblock notes, or alternatively, when used on a golem- the golem will follow whatever sound is bound on the tuning fork.
info.caverns_and_chasms.tmt: Detonates Fast. Deals no block or entity damage.
book.tomb_labyrinth.name: Sword and Spear of the Undying Pharaoh
book.tomb_labyrinth.page.1_2: Even after all the time the Pharaoh spent search for immortality,
book.tomb_labyrinth.page.2_1: That said, even if I can recreate only one of his weapons,
book.tomb_labyrinth.page.2_2: I'm sure I'd be take over the remains of his domain.
book.tomb_labyrinth.page.3_1: He placed a §5Gold-looking Spear§r into a §5magical chamber§r,
book.tomb_labyrinth.page.3_4: Let's see if I remember them.
book.tomb_labyrinth.page.4_1: §5Two Golden Apples, two of those weird Totems, two Candles, and two of those goldish ingots, though they were clearly not truly gold.§r
book.tomb_labyrinth.page.5_1: The Pharaoh trading some weird pig
book.tomb_labyrinth.page.5_2: people for the Spear and the ingots.
book.tomb_labyrinth.page.5_3: §5He even built a portal to summon them.§r
book.tomb_labyrinth.page.6_1: §5I suspect he used the same method to create his sword.§r
book.tomb_labyrinth.page.6_2: Though, until I figure out the portal,
book.tomb_labyrinth.page.6_3: I won't be able to make either...
book.tomb_labyrinth.page.6_4: Well, at least I have it written down, just in case.
book.ancient_mines.1.name: Nether Infused Metal
book.ancient_mines.1.page.1_1: During one of the incursions into the Nether, our warriors noticed the §5souls of the damned§r would cling to their §5rusted§r armors, further eroding it.
book.ancient_mines.1.page.2_1: It would be sturdier and more heat resistant, but also much less malleable.
book.ancient_mines.1.page.2_2: We initially thought it was another ploy by the Pigkin until we realized §5whatever metal survived would be further refined.§r
book.ancient_mines.1.page.3_1: Just as we thought this would be the secret needed to turn the tides, our portal was stormed and we were forced to dismantle it with our own hands. Without the Nether's influence, we were unable to produce more of this metal.
book.ancient_mines.1.page.4_1: That said, all I hope is that our brothers left beyond the portal had somehow discovered this too. It's their only chance at surviving the overwhelming force of the Pigkins.
book.apothecary_abode.1.name: To be Sent: Mansion
book.apothecary_adobe.1.page.1_2: To our glorious leader. We hope this note has reached your Manor safely.
book.apothecary_adobe.1.page.2_1: We've finally done it. You will be very, very pleased with these results. Our research into §5enhancing the regenerative properties of the golden apples and our Totems has been successful.§r
book.apothecary_adobe.1.page.3_1: All that needs to be done in to §5mix a Golden Apple or a Totem with extremely concentrated EXP and two Hallowed Gems in a heated basin.§r
book.apothecary_adobe.1.page.4_1: We hope these findings will serve us well.
book.archmages_tower.1.name: Magical Weapons
book.archmages_tower.1.page.1_1: I am the apprentice of the powerful Archmage that lives in this mighty tower. In this instruction manual, I will tell you how to create their magical weapons for yourself. The decaying relics locked away in this very tower are the key.
book.archmages_tower.1.page.2_1: Each weapon involves §5enchanting the decaying relic with gems as blue as the sea, bottles of highly concentrated experience, and 2 essence used for conjuring.§r
book.archmages_tower.1.page.3_1: Additionally, the blade requires 2 echoing tentacles, the spear requires 2 wings of a large creature, and the scythe requires 2 bottles of lightning.§r
book.archmages_tower.2.name: Arcanethyst
book.archmages_tower.2.page.1_2: In this journal I will detail how I imbued the power of levitation into a weapon using magical crystals.
book.archmages_tower.2.page.2_1: Each weapon involves §5enchanting the a greataxe covered in runic carvings with 2 purple cyrstals, 2 blocks of purple crystals, 2 source gems, and 2 mysterious gray membranes.§r
book.archmages_tower.2.page.3_1: I believe my apprentice found the gray membrane by slaying an insomia beast from the skies.§r
book.archmages_tower.2.page.4_1: Do with this what you will,
book.secret_lab.1.name: The Portal that Ended it all
book.secret_lab.1.page.1_1: This journal details how we made the portal device. Hopefully one day this report will be preserved as a piece of history amongst our people.
book.secret_lab.1.page.2_1: We first started with the raw stone from the meteor. We then imbued it with §5magical cystsals that were inside the meteor's core and bottles of dimensional energy.§r
book.secret_lab.1.page.3_1: Afterwards we §5plated it with an alloy made from the deepest reaches of the nether and the meteor itself,§r and §52 plates made from obsidian.§r
book.secret_lab.1.page.4_3: This resulted in the creation of the portal device. Our expedition into this new dimension begins tommorow, hopefully all goes well!
book.end_city.1.name: Stars Edge
book.end_city.1.page.1_2: Hello traveller of the stars. I am §kREDACTED
book.end_city.1.page.1_3: . I will pass down to you the legend that has been passsed down among my people for generations.
book.end_city.1.page.2_1: A legend of a twinblade, one forged from the stars themselves. A weapon so powerful it could bring down the most formidable foes.§r
book.end_city.1.page.3_1: To create such a blade it is rumored you need to create an alloy from the deepest reaches of the Nether and the stone of the End. Then, you must infuse it with magical crystals that could glow for an eternity, and dust from the end.§r
book.end_city.1.page.4_1: Use the power of the stars only for good. Your friend,
book.end_city.2.name: Brimstone Claymore
book.end_city.2.page.1_2: Greetings, traveller of distant skies. I've long studied relics in these silent cities. Among these scattered truths, I’ve uncovered whispers of a blade that harnesses brimstone’s explosive fury.
book.end_city.2.page.2_1: They say this claymore transcends mortal steel, infused with energies that detonate upon impact. To forge such a power, begin with a Runic Claymore, that mystic sword already etched with otherworldly runes.
book.end_city.2.page.3_1: Bring it to a Tier 4 Hephaestus Forge and circle it with eight Darkstone Pedestals. Upon these stands, place 3x Brimstone, 2x Crimson Gem§r, 2x Sulfur Dust, and 1x Shard torn from a fiery beast deep in the world’s molten veins.
book.end_city.2.page.4_1: Fuel this grand forge with 1000 Aureal, 10000 Blood, 500 Experience, and 25 Souls. As sparks and essence coalesce, the claymore shall erupt into a new form, one bound to explosive might.
book.end_city.2.page.4_2: Use its power with care, friend… for I remain in the shadows, §kREDACTED
book.haunted_manor.name: Watching Weapons
book.haunted_manor.page.1_2: This book will detail how to create the Watching Weapons. They are a dark evil that may end up turning against you. You have been warned.
book.haunted_manor.page.2_1: To create these dark weapons, infuse a Claymore or Warglaive made of ancient metal from Hell with 1 eye from a monster of the void, 1 bottle of experience in its purest form, 2 eyes of the end, 2 silk made from shadow itself, and 2 bottles of dimensional energy.
book.haunted_manor.page.3_1: Use this power only for evil. I'll always be watching,
book.armory.1.name: Weaponizing the Plague
book.armory.1.page.1_2: A plague of immense proportions swept through the myserious people that once lived in this great stronghold. This journal will detail how to weaponize this plague to your benefit.
book.armory.1.page.2_1: The blade with turn all things good into poison. Who am I? You may ask.
book.armory.1.page.3_1: To create this blade, infuse a Longsword made of ancient metal from Hell with 1 fang of the most poisonous beast, 2 bottles of poison essence, 2 poisonous potatoes, and 3 raw nuclear waste.
book.armory.1.page.4_1: Do with this what you will.
book.ancient_mines.2.name: Livyatan
book.ancient_mines.2.page.1_2: Our people have been crafting greataxes of substantial and unique powers for generations. This greataxe, Livyatan, harnesses the power of frost.
book.ancient_mines.2.page.2_1: To create this weapon, infuse a greataxe made of ancient metal from Hell with 1 bottle of an icy blood, 3 pieces of blue ice, 2 ingots of a darker looking iron, and 2 ingots of a material similar to gold.
book.ancient_city.1.name: Whisperwind
book.ancient_city.1.page.1_2: This journal will tell you how to harness the power of the air and the echo, to create a mighty Katana.
book.ancient_city.1.page.2_1: To create this blade, infuse a Katana covered in ancient runes with 2 echo shards, 2 tears of a creature that calls in the ocean, 2 bottles of hyper experience, and 2 essence of the air itself.
book.ancient_city.1.page.3_1: Do with this what you will.
book.ancient_mines.3.name: Molten Edge
book.ancient_mines.3.page.1_2: Our people have been crafting greataxes of substantial and unique powers for generations. This greataxe, the Molten Edge, harnesses the power of fire and magma.
book.ancient_mines.3.page.2_1: To create this weapon, infuse a greataxe made of ancient metal from Hell with 1 bottle of an fiery blood, 3 pieces of a primal magma, 2 bright red gems, and 2 essence of fire itself.
book.ancient_mines.4.name: Hearthflame
book.ancient_mines.4.page.1_2: Our people have been crafting greataxes of substantial and unique powers for generations. This hammer, the hearthflame, harnesses the power of volcanic rock uncovered deep within the earth.
book.ancient_mines.4.page.2_1: To create this weapon, infuse a greathammer made of ancient metal from Hell with 4 shards from the core of the earth, 2 ash from a volcano, and 2 essence of fire itself.
book.ancient_mines.5.name: Soulkeeper
book.ancient_mines.5.page.1_2: Our people have been crafting greataxes of substantial and unique powers for generations. This hammer, the soulkeeper, harnesses the power of the supernatural world.
book.ancient_mines.5.page.2_1: To create this weapon, infuse a greathammer made of ancient metal from Hell with 5 ghostly plasm, one glowing blue heart, and 2 skulls of great beasts.
book.frozen_crypt.1.name: Frostfall
book.frozen_crypt.1.page.1_1: Put a Runic Greathammer in a freezer.
book.frozen_crypt.1.page.3_1: Don't beleive me? Go find out!.
book.tinkers_workshop.1.name: Ribboncleaver
book.tinkers_workshop.1.page.1_2: Hello explorer. Well done, you have conquered my treacherous workshop. Disclosed below is how to create a powerful weapon. A weapon... that lives. The Ribboncleaver.
book.tinkers_workshop.1.page.2_1: To create this blade, infuse an iron claymore with an iron heart, a ribbon of dark silk, 2 of the strongest plates, 2 bright red gems, and 2 hard dark cladding.
book.tinkers_workshop.1.page.3_1: This is an extremely powerful weapon, use it cautiously. Or not!
book.tinkers_citadel.1.name: Tempest
book.tinkers_citadel.1.page.1_2: This journal will detail how we harnessed the elements. We created a Chakram of great power. One of air, fire, and water.
book.tinkers_citadel.1.page.2_1: To create this chakram, infuse a chakram covered in runes with 3 kinds of dragon blood, their corresponding essence, 1 shard from the earth's core, and a frosty magical pod.
book.tinkers_citadel.1.page.3_1: The council of tinkers deemed this weapon too dangerous to be created. So this journal was left up here. Proceed with caution.
book.nether_fortress.1.name: Emberlash
book.nether_fortress.1.page.1_2: Attached below are instructions for creating a whip of pure fire. It is said mighty beasts used to use such whips, until the last one was killed by a wizard.
book.nether_fortress.1.page.2_1: To create this lash of fire, infuse a sai made of an ancient metal with a squirming tendon, a bottle of fiery blood, 2 essence of fire, 2 dark silk from the depths, and 2 witherbones.
book.nether_fortress.2.name: Emberblade
book.nether_fortress.2.page.1_2: This journal details how to make a blade of pure fire.
book.nether_fortress.2.page.2_1: To create this blade of fire, infuse a sword made of an ancient metal with a rod of fire, a bottle of fiery blood, 2 bright red gemstones, 2 essence of fire, and 2 witherbones.
book.tree_of_wisdom.1.name: Bramblethorn
book.tree_of_wisdom.1.page.1_2: Hello. This book was written by me, the tree. I will tell you the meaning of life.
book.tree_of_wisdom.1.page.2_1: Just kidding! I'll tell you how to make a stick hit real hard. And posion things!
book.tree_of_wisdom.1.page.3_1: To create this super stick, infuse a stick with 2 spore spewing flowers, 2 roots from the caves, 2 bottles of poison, and 2 essence of the earth.
book.beekeepers_house.1.name: Hiveheart
book.beekeepers_house.1.page.1_2: I've created a mighty hammer you won't bee-leive, one with the power of the hive. Attached bee-low is how to create such a weapon. It will leave all your foes bee-hind you.
book.beekeepers_house.1.page.2_1: To create this honey hammer, infuse a gold hammer with 2 honeycomb blocks, 2 apples as golden as the sun, 2 buckets of honey, and 2 shards of the starbuncle.
book.beekeepers_house.1.page.3_2: Bee puns really sting, don't they?
book.necromancers_spire.1.name: Shadowsting
book.necromancers_spire.1.page.1_2: This journal will detail how to make a dark rapier. One that harnesses the shadow to destroy your enemies.
book.necromancers_spire.1.page.2_1: To create this evil blade, infuse a rapier made from a hellish dark metal with 2 silk made from darkness, 2 skreeching souls, 2 ingots of a silver and gold material, and 2 bottles of highly concentrated experience.
book.necromancers_spire.1.page.3_1: Use this weapon to terrorize those who stand in your way.
book.sanctum.1.name: Soul Pyre
book.sanctum.1.page.1_2: Here in the Sanctum dimensional energy converges. I have researched how to channel this energy, and created a powerful weapon.
book.sanctum.1.page.2_1: This weapon balances the powers of the inferno and the soul. These make a powerful combination.
book.sanctum.1.page.3_1: To create this weapon, infuse a greataxe made from a hellish metal with a glowing blue heart, a bottle of thick fiery blood, 2 ghostly jelly, 2 ingots of a gold-like material, and 2 bright red gemstones in a Godly Forge.
book.pillager_fortress.1.name: The Enigma
book.pillager_fortress.1.page.1_1: A recent expedition into the desert led to an encounter with a stormy foe. After slaying it, we have been researching how to take advantage of its power.
book.pillager_fortress.1.page.2_1: Just today we finally figured it out! The eye was the key...
book.pillager_fortress.1.page.3_1: So I'm writing this book to tell you what we've learned about utilizing the eye.
book.pillager_fortress.1.page.3_2: But we have one huge problem.. it was stolen. I personally think it was Johnny. It's always Johnny.
book.pillager_fortress.1.page.4_1: To create this weapon, infuse a golden claymore with the eye, 2 bottles of radiant green gas, 2 brass ingots, and 3 green gemstones.
book.pillager_fortress.1.page.5_2: This ingredients should be enough to wake the power of the eye. Good Luck.
book.pillager_fortress.2.name: The Totem
book.pillager_fortress.2.page.1_1: Here it is. The book detailing the secerte recipe for the totem of undying. This is the biggest kept secret of all the illagers.
book.pillager_fortress.2.page.2_1: To create this magical totem, mix Concentrated Experience, a golden magical token, and a bottle of green glowing gas.
book.pillager_fortress.2.page.2_2: Surpisingly, the creation of this healing device is somewhat nuclear.
book.pillager_fortress.2.page.3_2: For the good of the illagers.
book.farmhouse.1.name: The Farming Secret
book.farmhouse.1.page.1_2: All the other farmers have always wondered how I grow my crops so fast. I always tell them special fertilizer, better land, or I care for them better.
book.farmhouse.1.page.2_1: However, that is not the truth. The truth is that I have created magical totems of growth that I use to speed up the growth of my crops.
book.farmhouse.1.page.3_1: To create this totem, infuse a flower with 2 starbuncle shards and 2 uranium.
book.farmhouse.1.page.4_1: Use this power well. And keep it secret!
book.tinkers_workshop.2.name: Twisted Blade
book.tinkers_workshop.2.page.1_2: After conducting some research I have determined that a large blade twisted may lead to better aerodynamics and therefore faster attack speed.
book.tinkers_workshop.2.page.2_1: This book will instruct you how to create a fast but strong twisted blade.
book.tinkers_workshop.2.page.3_1: To create this blade you must run an iron claymore through a sequenced assembly in a loop 5 times with the following process. First press it, then deploy a strong nuclear plate onto it.
book.sanctum.2.name: The Soulblades
book.sanctum.2.page.1_2: In this book I will reveal how to create 2 weapons that manipulate the very souls of your enemies. Soulrender and Soulstealer.
book.sanctum.2.page.2_1: To create Soulrender imbue a scythe made of a hellish black metal with a wither skeleton skull, a piece of wraithing flesh, 2 souls that seem to scream, 2 beads of the soul, and 2 powder from a possessed flame.
book.sanctum.2.page.3_1: To create Soulstealer imbue a sai made of a hellish black metal with 1 silk made from pure shadow, a piece of wraithing flesh, 2 souls that seem to scream, 2 beads of the soul, and 2 powder from a possessed flame.
book.end_city.3.name: Weapons of Thunder and Lightning
book.end_city.3.page.1_2: Within these pages lie secrets of four mighty weapons: a hammer, a twinblade, a halberd, and a longsword. Each starts as a blade from alloys of the End and the Nether.
book.end_city.3.page.2_1: To transform these arms, place the chosen weapon in a Godly Forge, one surrounded by eight pedestals.Set: 2 Lightning Dragonsteel Ingots, 2 Bottles of Lightning, 2 Dark Durable Sheets, and 2 Blue Magnetic Ingots.
book.end_city.3.page.3_1: But mere placement is not enough. The device must be of Tier 5 quality and enhanced by Elementarium. Feed it 20,000 Aureal, 7,500 Experience, and 100 Souls.
book.end_city.3.page.4_1: Harness these powers and you shall command weapons worthy of legend. Let lightning and thunder heed your call, and use such might to guide this world toward balance, not ruin.
book.ruins_of_the_deep.1.name: Icewhisper
book.ruins_of_the_deep.1.page.1_2: This book will detail how to use the cold depths of the sea to create a weapon of such frost it freezes everything within its reach.
book.ruins_of_the_deep.1.page.2_1: Place a halberd made from a hellish metal into a magical device and surround it with 8 pedestals.
book.ruins_of_the_deep.1.page.3_1: Place 3 pieces of blue ice, a bottle of icy blood, 2 shards of the sea, and 2 frosty pods onto the pedestals.
book.ruins_of_the_deep.2.name: Totem of Torrents
book.ruins_of_the_deep.2.page.1_2: This book will detail how to create a magical totem that will allow you to swim like a dolphin beyond the water.
book.ruins_of_the_deep.2.page.2_1: To create this magical totem, mix Concentrated Experience, a golden magical token, oceanic shards, and the heart of the sea itself.
book.desert_pyramid.1.name: Pharaoh's Journal
book.desert_pyramid.1.page.1_1: The people chose me as their Pharaoh for one reason. I could protect them. I did using the Totem of Radiance I was able to craft.
book.desert_pyramid.1.page.2_1: It hurts all hostile creatures and will even highlight ones that are in the area. Enclosed below is the recipe for how to create such a powerful object.
book.desert_pyramid.1.page.3_3: Use it for good as I would have.
book.dark_tower.1.name: Dark Warblade
book.dark_tower.1.page.1_2: In this book lies a recipe for a weapon of immense power. But take warning, only the strongest of the strongest are capable of wielding such a weapon.
book.dark_tower.1.page.2_1: To create the Dark Warblade imbue a sword made of an alloy of the Nether and the End with pure darkness, 3 blocks of a dark metal, 2 seeds of pure chaos, and 2 ingots of obsidian.
book.dark_tower.1.page.3_1: May these forbidden words guide only those truly worthy of bearing such might. Depart now with caution, for in the forging of the Dark Warblade lies both destiny and doom.
book.apothecary_adobe.2.name: Recipe: Elixir of Rampage
book.apothecary_adobe.2.page.1_2: Within these pages lies the secret to creating the Elixir of Rampage, a brew that ignites ferocity in those bold enough to drink it. It's searing might may shred both mind and body if wielded by the unworthy.
book.apothecary_adobe.2.page.2_1: Begin with a heated cauldron. First, add two scoops of Mundabitur Dust, that strange ash of twisted fates. Then a measure of Blaze Powder to fan the embers of inner wrath, followed by Fire Dust dredged from charred chaos.
book.apothecary_adobe.2.page.3_1: Repeat this sequence until all ingredients—Mundabitur Dust, Blaze Powder, and Fire Dust—have blended into a molten, shimmering broth.
book.apothecary_adobe.2.page.4_1: If the heat doesn’t break you, and the fumes don’t blind you, you will hold in your hands the Elixir of Rampage: a vessel of raw, searing power, best sipped with caution.
book.apothecary_adobe.3.name: Recipe: Elixir of Vampirism
book.apothecary_adobe.3.page.1_2: Within these pages lies the secret to harnessing vampiric power. The key ingredient is the Lifestealer’s Bone, a relic from an ancient vampire lord who gave his soul to the Lord of Chaos for unimaginable might.
book.apothecary_adobe.3.page.2_1: Legends whisper that this Lifestealer either struck down the Dark Titan or became it, forever bound to undeath and thirsting for blood. To draw forth the essence of his fury, begin by heating a cauldron with molten rock—lava—until it boils with dread intensity.
book.apothecary_adobe.3.page.3_1: Once the cauldron seethes, drop in the Lifestealer Bone. Then pour in blood—bottles upon bottles—to feed the crimson hunger, and finally add a single Seed of Chaos, binding this gruesome brew to otherworldly forces.
book.apothecary_adobe.3.page.4_1: As these elements collide in the churning lava, a dark metamorphosis takes place. The mixture will twist and writhe, forging a crimson draught that grants its drinker vampiric strength and the power to steal life with each strike.
book.apothecary_adobe.3.page.5_1: Yet be warned: the Elixir of Vampirism demands a heavy toll. Only those prepared to embrace eternal hunger, to revel in the taste of mortal essence, should dare to sip this forbidden brew.
book.apothecary_adobe.4.name: Recipe: Elixir of Wither Resistance
book.apothecary_adobe.4.page.1_1: §4§lOn Brewing the Elixir of Wither Resistance
book.apothecary_adobe.4.page.1_2: Within these pages, learn to defy one of the most dreadful curses that plague mortal flesh: the Wither.
book.apothecary_adobe.4.page.2_1: Begin by stoking your cauldron with lava’s molten warmth. Once it bubbles with infernal heat, cast in shards of Wither, dark fragments born of corruption and decay.
book.apothecary_adobe.4.page.3_1: These Wither Shards seethe with malevolent energy, their presence threatening to consume any who dare approach. Yet, into this brew we must also place a Warped Wart—an unlikely savior with antidotal properties that tame the vile essence within.
book.apothecary_adobe.4.page.4_1: As the shards swirl in their molten prison and the Warped Wart’s magic takes root, the mixture begins to change. From chaos and corruption emerges a draught that stands against the Wither’s relentless grasp.
book.apothecary_adobe.4.page.5_1: Thus, the Elixir of Wither Resistance is born. A single sip grants resilience against that creeping blight, sparing your bones from the Wither’s inevitable decay. Use it wisely, for defiance of death itself always carries a price.
book.end_city.4.name: Caelestis
book.end_city.4.page.1_2: Legends whisper of a blade forged in star-kissed darkness, one that slips between realities. Its edge severs more than flesh—it parts the veil, granting passage into the astral plane and rendering the bearer untouchable.
book.end_city.4.page.2_1: To shape Caelestis, set a Runic Longsword into a Tier 5 Hephaestus Forge. Surround it with eight Darkstone Pedestals bearing: 2x Eternal Crystal, 2x Phantom Powder, 2x Shadow Gem, and 2x Corrupted Arcane Crystal.
book.end_city.4.page.3_1: Then, channel raw energies: 20000 Aureal, 25000 Blood, 1200 Experience, and 900 Souls. In these currents, the sword transcends its earthly shell, becoming an astral artifact that turns aside mortal harm.
book.end_city.4.page.4_1: Wield Caelestis wisely. In its presence, reality blurs and enemies strike at illusions. May those who dare awaken this blade find themselves worthy of its cosmic grace.
book.abandoned_mineshaft.1.name: Recipe: Spider Bite
book.abandoned_mineshaft.1.page.1_2: In these pages, you shall find the method to craft a blade steeped in venom and cunning.
book.abandoned_mineshaft.1.page.2_1: §rFirst, let your cauldron roar with molten lava. Into this seething basin, cast Fermented Spider Eyes to awaken the brew’s vile nature, and Intoxicating Decoctions—twice over—to stir the mind into fevered delirium.
book.abandoned_mineshaft.1.page.3_1: §rNext, add Poison Bottles from rattlesnakes, each drop intensifying the sword’s deadly promise. Finally, place Spider Mandibles, torn from the jaws of a giant spider mother, to anchor a potent and venomous sting.
book.abandoned_mineshaft.1.page.4_1: §rAs the cauldron churns and hisses, these corrupt ingredients meld into a liquid malignancy. From these depths you shall draw forth the Spider Bite Sword—an eerie blade that can summon skittering spider kin to fight at your side.
book.abandoned_mineshaft.1.page.5_1: §rUse it wisely, for those who taste this blade’s venom rarely live to regret it. The Spider Bite is no mere weapon; it is a whispering darkness, a testament to what brews in shadows when danger and desperation collide.
book.dark_tower.2.name: Great Reaper Axe
book.dark_tower.2.page.1_2: I record these words in secret, hidden within the whispering shadows of the Dark Tower. I, once a warlord feared across a hundred realms, now share a weapon of pure rage.
book.dark_tower.2.page.2_1: There exists a forge, a godly machine of terrible majesty. Place within it an axe born of twisted alloys—metals whose origin lies where Nether flame meets End’s quiet despair.
book.dark_tower.2.page.3_1: One must seek strange artifacts: dust that spark with raw energy, seeds that know only chaos, and metal blocks dark as midnight. Ther are Gems too, ones from the soul itself.
book.dark_tower.2.page.4_1: When the rite is complete, the weapon born shall be no mere blade—it shall be The Great Reaper Axe.
book.tinkers_citadel.2.name: Arcane Crystal
book.tinkers_citadel.2.page.1_2: These blasted Arcane Crystals—once, I used drills to get them! Months of sweat and grime yielded only a handful of shards. So, I set my mind to a craftier solution.
book.tinkers_citadel.2.page.2_2: I took Prismarine Crystals—those shimmering gifts of the ocean, resonant with quiet magic—and fed them into a newly devised sequenced assembly. But, it was to no avail.
book.tinkers_citadel.2.page.3_1: These raw crystals alone weren’t enough to spark the essence of Arcane potential. I needed more—something stranger. I soon learned that filling them with Hyper Experience—liquid could prime them for transformation.
book.tinkers_citadel.2.page.4_1: Next, I would deploy Pixie Dust. A magical, frankly delicious, pink powder. Lastly, I would press it.
book.tinkers_citadel.2.page.5_1: As I pen these final words, I recall the ache in my arms from old mining days and relish the absence of that pain. Let the world marvel at my innovation, or ignore it—I care not. The crystals are mine now, shaped by wits, not brute force.

book.bastion.1.name: Fire Ale
book.bastion.1.page.1_2: Word’s spreading like wildfire—literally—about our latest creation. We call it Fire Ale. It’s not just a drink; it’s a triumph.
book.bastion.1.page.2_1: First, a pinch of Mundabitur Dust. Then, a bottle of Fire Resistance potion and lava poured straight into the cauldron, heated until the brew crackles and spits like a living thing.
book.bastion.1.page.3_1: The first sip? Like swallowing a blaze’s roar. It warms you from the inside out, toughens the spirit. The others are coming around now. Even the warlords are asking for a taste.
book.bastion.1.page.4_1: I’ll keep perfecting it. Perhaps this will be my legacy—a drink so bold, it could only come from the heart of the Bastion. But for now, the cauldron calls. Time to make another batch.
book.ancient_factory.1.name: The Birth of Witherite
book.ancient_factory.1.page.1_2: I’ve done it. Witherite—crafted from molten netherite, the heart of a Wither, and fiery dust—born of fire, death, and flame.
book.ancient_factory.1.page.2_1: A process reapeated twice: molten netherite poured onto a block of dark metal, the Wither’s heart deployed, and fiery dust ignites the reaction. When pressed with force, the materials fuse into something greater.
book.ancient_factory.1.page.3_1: This is just the beginning. With this power, I will forge a weapon of power this world has yet seen.
book.sunken_city.1.name: Abyssal Ingots
book.sunken_city.1.page.1_2: Within the depths of the Sunken City, where the very stones seem to murmur secrets from a forgotten age, I have discovered a method to duplicate the ingots imbued with Abyssal powers.
book.sunken_city.1.page.2_1: This ancient knowledge has been hidden for generations, passed down only to those with the will to survive its dangers.
book.sunken_city.1.page.3_1: 1: An Ingot with Abyssal Powers — The core of the ritual, this ingot must already contain the essence of the abyss, a remnant of the unfathomable depths.
book.sunken_city.1.page.4_1: 2: A Dark, Swirling Vortex — This vortex, drawn from the depths of space, will channel the raw chaotic energy required to imbue the ingot with its cursed power.
book.sunken_city.1.page.5_1: 3: Magically Reinforced Weave — The weave will serve as a catalyst, amplifying the dark energies as they swirl and meld with the ingot.
book.sunken_city.1.page.6_1: 4: Lead in its hottest form — The final ingredient, lead heated to a molten state, serves to ground the ingot, stabilizing the abyssal power within.
book.sunken_city.1.page.7_1: This knowledge is dangerous, yes. But the rewards are greater. With these ingots, we can build our own power—one that transcends both sorcery and steel. I will forge weapons of the abyss. I will harness its power, and none will be able to stand against us.
book.cursed.pyramid.1.name: Ancient Metal
book.cursed.pyramid.1.page.1_2: The gods have called upon me to craft their finest weapons, and I will answer. To forge the ingots that hold their power, I need only mix the following in a superheated basin.
book.cursed.pyramid.1.page.2_1: 1: A Magical Mixture of brass and gold — This is the foundation, the first step in forging a weapon worthy of a god. The balance between them must be perfect, neither too much brass nor too much gold.
book.cursed.pyramid.1.page.3_1: 2: A Small Piece of silver fused with cincinnasite — This fusion is the secret to unlocking the strength of the gods. It radiates energy that few have seen, and fewer still have understood.
book.cursed.pyramid.1.page.4_1: 3: The Sap of a prehistoric tree — I’ve gathered it from the oldest tree I could find, its roots buried in ancient soil. This sap is said to hold power that even the gods once revered.
book.cursed.pyramid.1.page.5_1: 4: Concentrated Experience — The essence of those who have faced the unimaginable trials of life, distilled into its purest form. It is the final key to unlocking the ingots' power.
book.cursed.pyramid.1.page.6_1: Once these ingredients are combined, they must be heated beyond the capabilities of mortal hands. Only then will the ingots form, glowing with the power to create weapons that will shake the heavens.
book.cursed.pyramid.2.name: Cursium
book.cursed.pyramid.2.page.1_2: This process is both sacred and dangerous, but I believe it will grant us the power to preserve our leaders for eternity.
book.cursed.pyramid.2.page.2_1: 1: A Cursed Ingot — The heart of the ritual. The ingot must already be steeped in ancient power, a vessel of the curse that holds the essence of life and death.
book.cursed.pyramid.2.page.3_1: 2: A Haunted Soul — This must be a soul that has been bound to the world of the living, but not in peace. It is the essence of life that cannot rest.
book.cursed.pyramid.2.page.4_1: 3: The Flesh of a Vessel — The living form from which the essence of the soul can be drawn.
book.cursed.pyramid.2.page.5_1: 4: Necromium in its hottest form — A rare and volatile material, heated to its most intense state. It is the force that will bind all elements together, forging the ingot anew.
book.cursed.pyramid.2.page.6_1: I cannot fail. If this process succeeds, we will have the means to preserve our leaders forever, beyond the reach of death.
book.burning_arena.1.name: Ignitium
book.burning_arena.1.page.1_2: I will detail a dangerous metal. With this metal, I could build weapons of unimaginable destruction, and with them, I could bend the world to my will.
book.burning_arena.1.page.2_1: 1: A Flaming Ingot — The base, a metal already ignited by the infernal fires.
book.burning_arena.1.page.3_1: 2: The Powder of a Blaze — This will amplify the flames, capturing the essence of the Blazes that haunt the Nether.
book.burning_arena.1.page.4_1: 3: The Blood of a Fiery Beast — Perhaps a fire dragon, a creature so hot its blood could burn through anything.
book.burning_arena.1.page.5_1: 4: Netherite in its hottest form — The most powerful of metals, taken directly from the heart of the Nether.
book.burning_arena.1.page.6_1: The result? A Flaming Ingot, the very embodiment of fire itself. When forged into weapons, it can slice through armor and melt stone, burning everything it touches. With armor crafted from this metal, no flame will ever harm you.
book.abandoned_mineshaft.2.name: Summons
book.abandoned_mineshaft.2.page.1_2: Our citadel is under siege by the Pigkin.
book.abandoned_mineshaft.2.page.1_3: Please return as soon as possible with as many mineral as you've gathered. Do not use the portals. They are no longer safe.
book.bearclaw_inn.1.page.1.1:
Journal: Day 45
~~~~~~~~~~~~
Today we discovered tracks that lead into dark and eerie cave. Tonight we plan to set multiple honey traps in hopes to draw the bear out of its cave.
book.bearclaw_inn.1.page.2.1:
Journal: Day 58
~~~~~~~~~~~~
The bear took all of the honey in our traps without setting off the traps. It seems to be very clever. We may have to try brute force to scare it away from our village.
